rand-althor.name: Rand al'Thor
aliases: He Who Comes With the Dawn

1.description: The Dragon Reborn has become increasingly cold and hard, struggling with the enormous pressures of his destiny.

22.description: Under the influence of Semirhage and the Domination Band, forced to nearly kill Min in a moment of terrible darkness.

47.description: Reaches his darkest moment and considers ending everything, feeling the weight of his failures and the impossibility of victory.

50.description: Experiences a profound transformation and reintegration, becoming whole again and ready to face the Last Battle.

2.description: Imprisoned in the White Tower, maintaining her dignity and authority despite being held captive by the Tower Aes Sedai.

12.description: Endures punishment and interrogation while working to undermine Elaida's authority from within the Tower.

39.description: Leads the defense of the Tower during the Seanchan attack, proving her worth as the true Amyrlin Seat.

49.description: Successfully reunites the White Tower, becoming the acknowledged Amyrlin Seat of all Aes Sedai.

10.description: Now married to Tuon (Fortuona) and holding the title Prince of the Ravens in the Seanchan Empire.

28.description: Adapts to his new role while maintaining his essential character and preparing for the challenges ahead.

10.description: Now known as Fortuona, has assumed the title of Empress after completing the marriage ceremony with Mat.

28.description: Rules the Seanchan while balancing her imperial duties with her relationship with Mat.

1.description: Stays close to Rand despite his growing coldness, providing what emotional support she can while fearing for his wellbeing.

22.description: Nearly killed by Rand while he was under the Domination Band's control, experiencing the horror of his darkest moment.

50.description: Witnesses Rand's transformation and renewal, understanding that the man she loves has finally found peace.

1.description: Held captive but extremely dangerous, plotting her escape and revenge against those who captured her.

22.description: Escapes captivity and uses the Domination Band to control Rand, forcing him to nearly kill Min in a moment of pure evil.

23.description: Meets her end at Rand's hands, destroyed by his channeling in a moment of terrible rage and desperation.

1.description: Continues her attempts to guide Rand, growing increasingly concerned about his emotional hardening and loss of humanity.

47.description: Plays a crucial role in Rand's moment of crisis, helping to create the conditions for his eventual transformation.

1.description: Worries about Rand's condition while using her healing abilities to help those around him who are affected by his darkness.

50.description: Witnesses Rand's renewal with relief and hope, understanding that the boy she helped raise has finally found peace.

2.description: Maintains her position as Tower Amyrlin while dealing with Egwene's continued resistance and the growing instability in the Tower.

39.description: Fails catastrophically during the Seanchan attack on the Tower, proving her incompetence as a leader.

46.description: Captured by the Seanchan during their attack, facing the ultimate humiliation of being collared as damane.

3.description: Works tirelessly to support Egwene's cause while managing the rebel Aes Sedai during their Amyrlin's imprisonment.

48.description: Celebrates the successful reunification of the Tower under Egwene's leadership, seeing her efforts vindicated.

12.description: Continues to struggle with his conflicted loyalties between the Tower and his love for the imprisoned Egwene.

39.description: Plays a crucial role during the Seanchan attack, ultimately choosing to support Egwene over his Tower allegiance.

2.description: The Mistress of Novices who oversees Egwene's punishment, gradually developing respect for the young woman's strength.

39.description: Recognizes Egwene's true worth during the Tower crisis and becomes one of her strongest supporters.

6.description: A Brown Sister in the White Tower who begins to question Elaida's leadership as problems mount.

39.description: Plays an important role during the Seanchan attack, helping to organize the Tower's defense.

6.description: A Gray Sister who works to investigate the Black Ajah within the Tower while growing disillusioned with Elaida.

39.description: Contributes to the Tower's defense during the Seanchan attack while continuing her investigative work.

6.description: A White Sister involved in hunting the Black Ajah, working with others to root out Darkfriends among the Aes Sedai.

43.description: Continues her dangerous work of identifying and eliminating Black Ajah influence within the Tower.

6.description: A Red Sister who joins the hunt for Black Ajah members, bringing her Ajah's dedication to the cause.

43.description: Proves instrumental in identifying and dealing with Black Ajah members within the Tower structure.

6.description: A Yellow Sister who participates in the Black Ajah hunt, using her Ajah's skills in the investigation.

43.description: Continues working with the other hunters to cleanse the Tower of Black Ajah influence.

4.description: A Green Sister seeking justice for her sister's death, pursuing those responsible with grim determination.

27.description: Concludes her quest for justice, having dealt with those who murdered her sister.

3.description: Continues to compete for influence among the rebel Aes Sedai while Egwene remains imprisoned in the Tower.

49.description: Accepts Egwene's authority as the reunited Tower comes together under the true Amyrlin's leadership.

3.description: Rivals Romanda for leadership of the rebel faction while their chosen Amyrlin remains captive.

49.description: Also accepts Egwene's reunified authority, recognizing her as the legitimate Amyrlin Seat.

3.description: The Keeper among the rebels, working to maintain organization while their Amyrlin is held captive.

48.description: Faces consequences as her true loyalties and past actions are revealed during the Tower's reunification.

39.description: Reveals herself to be a member of the Black Ajah who has been working against them from within.

43.description: Provides crucial information about Black Ajah operations before dying from the oath-breaking consequences.

16.description: A Forsaken operating within the White Tower, manipulating events and maintaining her hidden identity.

43.description: Continues her infiltration and manipulation while the Tower faces multiple crises.

2.description: Former Keeper to Elaida, now operating in the shadows as a Black Ajah member under threat from Shaidar Haran.

43.description: Continues her Black Ajah activities while trying to avoid detection by the hunters in the Tower.

13.description: His strength in saidin has fully returned, making him a powerful ally in the events leading to the Last Battle.

50.description: Witnesses Rand's transformation and understands the significance of this change for the coming conflicts.

47.description: Brought to help reach Rand in his moment of greatest darkness, representing the love and humanity he has lost.

50.description: Plays a crucial role in Rand's transformation, helping his son find his way back to his essential humanity.

17.description: Continues her Wise One training while worrying about Rand's increasing darkness and emotional distance.

50.description: Witnesses Rand's renewal with relief and joy, understanding that the man she loves has returned to himself.

1.description: Continues to serve Rand with her powerful abilities while adapting to freedom from Seanchan control.

22.description: Plays a crucial role in the confrontation with Semirhage, using her strength to help contain the threat.

17.description: Continues his duties while observing Rand's deteriorating condition with growing concern.

50.description: Witnesses Rand's transformation and understands its importance for the battles to come.

7.description: Continues as Elayne's Warder while dealing with the ongoing challenges facing the Queen of Andor.

38.description: Provides protection and counsel to Elayne while adapting to the changing political landscape.

7.description: Rules as Queen of Andor while dealing with her advancing pregnancy and the challenges of leadership.

38.description: Manages royal duties while preparing for motherhood and the approaching Last Battle.

10.description: Continues to provide wise counsel and support, now involved in the complex dynamics of Mat's new royal status.

42.description: Adapts to the changing circumstances while maintaining his role as a trusted advisor and friend.

10.description: Continues her devoted service to Tuon, now Empress Fortuona, adapting to the new imperial dynamics.

42.description: Maintains her position as the Empress's most trusted attendant while navigating the complexities of court life.

10.description: Continues to grow and mature under Mat's guidance, adapting to the new circumstances of Mat's royal marriage.

42.description: Shows increasing wisdom and understanding as he observes the adult world of politics and relationships.

19.description: Faces the consequences of her past actions and failures, having fallen from imperial favor.

34.description: Continues to face punishment and degradation for her role in the Daughter of the Nine Moons incident.

recaps.1: Rand has become increasingly cold and hard, while Semirhage remains a dangerous captive plotting her escape and revenge.
recaps.2: Egwene maintains her dignity despite being imprisoned in the White Tower, while Elaida struggles with growing instability.
recaps.3: The rebel Aes Sedai work to support their imprisoned Amyrlin while political maneuvering continues among their leaders.
recaps.4: Vandene pursues her quest for justice against those who murdered her sister, driven by grim determination.
recaps.5: Rand's emotional hardening continues while those around him grow increasingly concerned about his condition and humanity.
recaps.6: Tower Aes Sedai begin hunting the Black Ajah while questioning Elaida's leadership as problems mount in the White Tower.
recaps.7: Elayne rules as Queen of Andor while managing her advancing pregnancy and the various challenges of leadership.
recaps.8: The rebel Aes Sedai continue their political struggles while supporting their captive Amyrlin from a distance.
recaps.9: Various storylines develop as characters face personal and political challenges in their respective situations.
recaps.10: Mat adapts to his new role as Prince of the Ravens while Tuon, now Fortuona, assumes full imperial authority.
recaps.11: Multiple characters deal with the consequences of recent events while preparing for future challenges and conflicts.
recaps.12: Egwene endures punishment while undermining Elaida's authority, as Gawyn struggles with his divided loyalties.
recaps.13: Rand faces mounting pressures while Logain's power returns fully, making him an important ally for future battles.
recaps.14: Political and personal situations continue to develop as various characters work toward their respective goals.
recaps.15: The rebel Aes Sedai maintain their cause while their leaders compete for influence during Egwene's continued captivity.
recaps.16: Black Ajah hunters work within the Tower while Mesaana continues her hidden manipulation of Tower events.
recaps.17: Rand's darkness deepens while those who love him, including Aviendha and Min, worry about his deteriorating condition.
recaps.18: Various storylines progress as characters face the consequences of past decisions and prepare for future conflicts.
recaps.19: Mat continues adapting to his royal status while Suroth faces the consequences of her failures and lost favor.
recaps.20: The complex dynamics of the Seanchan court continue to evolve following Tuon's transformation into Empress Fortuona.
recaps.21: Political and personal relationships develop as characters navigate the changing landscape of power and loyalty.
recaps.22: Semirhage escapes and uses the Domination Band to control Rand, forcing him to nearly kill Min in a moment of pure evil.
recaps.23: Rand destroys Semirhage in a moment of terrible rage, marking a crucial turning point in his darkening journey.
recaps.24: The aftermath of recent crises affects multiple characters as they deal with trauma and plan for future challenges.
recaps.25: The rebel Aes Sedai continue their work while adapting to the changing situation of their imprisoned Amyrlin.
recaps.26: Tower politics intensify as various factions prepare for the coming crisis while the Black Ajah hunt continues.
recaps.27: Vandene concludes her quest for justice, having dealt with those responsible for her sister's murder.
recaps.28: Mat and Tuon work to establish their new relationship dynamic within the context of Seanchan imperial politics.
recaps.29: Rand continues his descent into darkness while those around him struggle to find ways to help or influence him.
recaps.30: Elayne manages her royal duties while various other characters advance their goals and face new challenges.
recaps.31: The situation around Rand becomes increasingly desperate as his emotional coldness reaches dangerous new depths.
recaps.32: Political maneuvering continues among the rebel Aes Sedai while they work to support their captive Amyrlin.
recaps.33: Tower Aes Sedai prepare for coming challenges while the Black Ajah hunters continue their dangerous work.
recaps.34: Seanchan politics develop further as various characters adapt to the new imperial structure under Fortuona.
recaps.35: Rand's condition continues to deteriorate while his allies search desperately for ways to reach him.
recaps.36: Multiple storylines advance as characters work toward resolution of their immediate challenges and goals.
recaps.37: The crisis around Rand intensifies as those who care about him realize the gravity of his emotional state.
recaps.38: Elayne continues her royal duties while other characters face their own challenges and make important decisions.
recaps.39: The Seanchan attack the White Tower in a devastating assault that exposes Elaida's failures and proves Egwene's worth.
recaps.40: The aftermath of the Tower attack creates new opportunities and challenges for all involved parties.
recaps.41: Tower politics shift dramatically as the consequences of the Seanchan attack become clear to all involved.
recaps.42: Various characters adapt to the new reality created by recent dramatic events and their far-reaching consequences.
recaps.43: Verin reveals her true nature and provides crucial information about the Black Ajah before dying from oath-breaking.
recaps.44: The information about the Black Ajah creates opportunities for cleansing the Tower of its hidden corruption.
recaps.45: Political situations reach resolution points as various factions deal with the revelations and changing dynamics.
recaps.46: Elaida faces the ultimate humiliation of capture and collaring by the Seanchan during their devastating Tower attack.
recaps.47: Rand reaches his darkest moment and considers ending everything until Tam's intervention provides a crucial anchor.
recaps.48: The Tower begins its reunification process as Egwene's leadership proves itself and former rebels celebrate vindication.
recaps.49: Egwene successfully reunites the White Tower, becoming the acknowledged Amyrlin Seat of all Aes Sedai factions.
recaps.50: Rand experiences a profound transformation and renewal, becoming whole again and ready to face the Last Battle ahead.
